other_tests.findings: Basal serum GH concentrations of 0.7 ng/ml after an overnight fast, with a peak concentration of 26 ng/ml after stimulation with ornithine.
Basal IGF-I level of 51 ng/ml, reaching only 82 ng/ml on day 5 after GH injections.
Normal hearing including pure-tone audiometry, hearing and listening test, speech audiogram, ottoacoustic emissions, and acoustic impedance.
